description: Domestic abuse charity Safer says more people came to them for help during the Covid pandemic.
title: Guernsey abuse refuge demand sees push for bigger shelter
title_page: Guernsey abuse refuge demand sees push for bigger shelter - BBC News
maintext: "We are fairly limited in terms of this refuge - it's lovely, but it's small; and we're looking to secure a new refuge, which will be bigger, have more space and we will be able to accommodate men within the refuge too.
